name: Three Nights of Knights
description:
1. A Knight collects treasure for his liege lord.
2. A Knight will defend himself if necessary.
3. A Knight shall always help those in need.

Egads! A curse has befallen all of your fellow knights, turning them into shambling zombie-like beasts. Fortunately, once you've knocked some sense into them, a bit of money seems to clear that ye olde curse from your tin can buddies.

~

A game for GMC Jam 38, made from scratch in less than four days in GMS 1.4

Xbox Gamepad is supported:

  • Right Trigger to attack
  • Left Trigger to block
  • A to jump
  • B to revive/enter doors

Additional controls:

  • F to toggle full screen
  • M to toggle music
  • I to enter "debug" mode
  • Keypad + and - adjust difficulty by making the cursed knights harder or easier to fight. Note that the effects won't take place unless you change it at the start screen.
